skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I have experience building intuitive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React to create smooth front-end experiences.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I excel at developing robust and secure back-end systems to drive complex applications and workflows using languages like Python, Java, Node.js and databases like MongoDB and MySQL.

skills.title: Machine Learning
skills.description: I possess working knowledge of major machine learning algorithms including regression, classification and clustering techniques using libraries like TensorFlow, OpenCV and Scikit-Learn.

skills.title: Computer Vision
skills.description: I have good understanding of popular computer vision techniques like image classification, object detection using convolutional neural networks

portfolio.title: Feast Finder
portfolio.description: FeastFinder emerged from a frustration with tedious food discovery. Simplifying the search for unique local restaurants, we connect users with their community through personalized recommendations. Using advanced machine learning, we revive the joy of food discovery, making it seamless and enjoyable.

portfolio.title: Shooting Game
portfolio.description: This is a simple shooting game where you can shoot targets to earn points. The game has different levels, modes, and scoring mechanisms. Enjoy playing and try to beat your high scores!

portfolio.title: Computer Vision
portfolio.description: Developed computer vision applications for hand gesture recognition, facial feature identification, fitness posture tracking and real-time sudoku solving using OpenCV for image processing and neural networks for object classification.
